metadata.description: Adorable Atsushi has just enrolled in a brand-new school so he can finally be reunited with his first, true love! But what if the man he's sure is the one?isn't at all?! Will another beautiful new face catch Atsushi's eye and steal his innocent heart? Class is now in session?and there's no telling who's gonna get the highest marks!
metadata.name: Bad Teacher's Equation
